Name: Stay Safe 2020
About the game: In a world where news of the pandemic, endless chores, and loneliness are the only things that exist anymore, an unexpected phone call will drastically change your life forever. It’s an old woman on the other end, and she desperately needs your help! Unfortunately, you don’t know who she is, where she lives, or even her phone number. What are you supposed to do? STAY SAFE 2020 is a fun, light-hearted platformer that tells a brief story of a young person’s quest to help an old woman in need. As you risk your life to break the lockdown, you’ll find a world in disarray, filled with deadly viruses. Along the way, you’ll meet a cast of characters who can guide you toward your goal, if you can accomplish a number of tasks that is. Take a break from your own lockdown blues, and escape into this fun story that takes you from pandemic zero to pandemic hero! Download STAY SAFE 2020 now!
